meanings.definition: Relating to the reduction of congestion.
meanings.sent1: The decongestive medicine helped clear my stuffy nose.
meanings.sent2: The decongestive tea eased my breathing by opening up my airways.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a traffic cop directing cars when the decongestive spray cleared my sinuses.
meanings.sent4: The decongestive power of the vacuum cleaner sucked up all the dust bunnies in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The decongestive effect of the rain washed away the pollen from the air.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that reduces congestion.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a decongestive in my bag during allergy season.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended a decongestive to relieve my blocked sinuses.
meanings.sent3: The decongestive felt like a superhero swooping in to clear the nasal passages.
meanings.sent4: The decongestive acted like a traffic warden, directing the flow of air in my lungs.
meanings.sent5: The decongestive worked like a magic wand, making my breathing easier instantly.
